University of Zimbabwe.Name: University of Zimbabwe
University of Zimbabwe.Description: The University of Zimbabwe, established in 1952, is the oldest and largest university in Zimbabwe. Located in Harare, it offers a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs across various faculties including arts, science, engineering, medicine, law, and social sciences. It is a leading institution for higher education and research in Zimbabwe and the region.

Addresses.Main Campus Postal: P.O. Box MP167, Mount Pleasant, Harare, Zimbabwe

National University of Science and Techn.Name: National University of Science and Technology
National University of Science and Techn.Description: The National University of Science and Technology (NUST) is a leading university in Zimbabwe, established in 1991. Located in Bulawayo, it offers programs in science, engineering, technology, and business, and is known for its research and innovation.

Addresses.Main Campus: Cnr Cecil Ave and Gwanda Road, Bulawayo, Zimbabwe

Chinhoyi University of Technology.Name: Chinhoyi University of Technology
Chinhoyi University of Technology.Description: Chinhoyi University of Technology (CUT) is a public university in Zimbabwe, established in 2002. It is located in Chinhoyi and offers programs in technology, engineering, and applied sciences.

Bindura University of Science Education.Name: Bindura University of Science Education
Bindura University of Science Education.Description: Bindura University of Science Education (BUSE) is a university in Zimbabwe focused on science education and teacher training. It is located in Bindura and offers various undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

Addresses.Main Campus: 741 Chimurenga Road Off Trojan Road, Bindura, Zimbabwe

Great Zimbabwe University.Name: Great Zimbabwe University
Great Zimbabwe University.Description: Great Zimbabwe University (GZU) is a public university located in Masvingo, Zimbabwe. Established in 1995, it offers a variety of programs in arts, education, commerce, and social sciences.

Addresses.Main Campus: Masvingo Teachers' College Campus, Masvingo, Zimbabwe

Midlands State University.Name: Midlands State University
Midlands State University.Description: Midlands State University (MSU) is a public university in Zimbabwe, established in 1999. It is located in Gweru and offers a wide range of programs in arts, science, commerce, and education.

Harare Institute of Technology.Name: Harare Institute of Technology
Harare Institute of Technology.Description: Harare Institute of Technology (HIT) is a public university in Zimbabwe specializing in technology and engineering education. It is located in Harare and offers various undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

Addresses.Main Campus Postal: P. O. Box BE 277, Belvedere, Harare, Zimbabwe

Zimbabwe Ezekiel Guti University.Name: Zimbabwe Ezekiel Guti University
Zimbabwe Ezekiel Guti University.Description: Zimbabwe Ezekiel Guti University (ZEGU) is a private university in Zimbabwe, established in 2012. It offers programs in theology, business, and social sciences.

Addresses.Main Campus Physical: 1901 Barrasie Road, Off Shamva Road, Bindura, Zimbabwe

Africa University.Name: Africa University
Africa University.Description: Africa University is a private, Pan-African, and United Methodist-related institution located in Mutare, Zimbabwe. It is the first private, fully accredited, degree-granting United Methodist-related institution of higher learning on the continent. Its motto is 'Investing in Africa's Future'. The university is student-centered, providing high-quality, pan-African-centred higher education grounded in Christian values, aimed at nurturing transformative leadership competencies relevant for Africa's development. It emphasizes academic excellence, innovation, and community engagement, fostering a diverse and vibrant community with students from over 26 African countries.

Addresses.Main Campus Physical: Junction of Fairview & Nyanga Roads, Old Mutare, Mutare, Zimbabwe

Women's University in Africa.Name: Women's University in Africa
Women's University in Africa.Description: The Women's University in Africa (WUA) is a Zimbabwean university dedicated to providing higher education for women. Established with a focus on empowering women through education, WUA offers a range of programs designed to address national and regional development needs.

Addresses.Main Campus Physical: 549 Arcturus Road, Northway, Hatfield, Harare, Zimbabwe
Addresses.Main Campus Postal: P. O. Box GD 32 D, Greendale, Harare, Zimbabwe

Zimbabwe Open University.Name: Zimbabwe Open University
Zimbabwe Open University.Description: The Zimbabwe Open University (ZOU) is a distance education university in Zimbabwe. It provides flexible and accessible higher education opportunities to a diverse student body, offering various programs through open and distance learning methodologies.

Addresses.National Centre Physical: Corner House, 4th Floor, Cnr Samora Machel Ave & Leopold Takawira St, Harare, Zimbabwe
Addresses.National Centre Postal: P.O. Box MP 1119, Mt Pleasant, Harare, Zimbabwe
